categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Morrun Dokaas was a Chagrian male Sith of the Sith Empire on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas. He was secretly a member of the Sith cult known as the Revanites in which he helped to test new members during their pilgrimage to join the cult. He did so by asking the recruit a number of questions about the Sith Lord Revan's use of aliens as allies.
